com.remotejvm

Interface RemoteJVM


  • public interface RemoteJVM
    A RemoteJVM represents an instance of another JVM on a distant node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.Serializable transfert(java.io.Serializable object)
      Transfert a local object to the remote JVM.

    • Method Detail

      • transfert

        java.io.Serializable transfert(java.io.Serializable object)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Transfert a local object to the remote JVM. The object is transfered through serialization.

        This methods returns a proxy instance that allow you to launch from your local JVM methods on the remote object. So methods through this proxy are executed on the remote JVM.

        The result is also retrieved through serialization.

        Parameters:
        object - a local object to be sent to the remote JVM
        Returns:
        a proxy that allows to call methods to the remote object.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
